name: Enzyme
overview: A well put together multi-directional space shooter, you can upgrade weapons and ship between levels based on the money collected in the level. Game created by Juned Wahab and published in Magic Disk 64 1995/01. A level is divided into several sub-levels: Part 1: The standard levels, info on this can be seen in the intro. Bonus Level - You either have to work your way from bottom to top through a star field (Attention: You can only steer upwards, not backwards or right or left) without colliding with a stone or you have to fly from left to right through a kind of labyrinth. Part 3: Now you are back in the game intro that you see at the beginning of the game. There are several doors in this menu. The right door is a materials office where you can buy new and better weapons. In the middle door you can see the high scores and the left door contains many interesting features.
